description:
In the last quarter of 2011, we created this webinar to answer the question:

How will I make the most of my sales career next year?

By focusing on the rise of social media, and combining it with the unique challenges a salesperson faces when planning out next year's sales plan, we offer plans and perspectives on this professional sales training program for taking full advantage of a new year.

Take this Professional Sales Training Program course and take full advantage of the Year.

</p>
title: How to Take Full Advantage of 2012
